something_you_did_other_reason_details: candidate was invited initailly to attend a primary interview as the application was more geared to that programme but did not respond
candidate_behaviour_what_to_improve: Ensure you respond to providers in a timely manner - much of teaching does depend on excellent organisation and meeting deadlines so this is a skill you need to work on
personal_statement_what_to_improve: This really wasnt focused on secondary education and was very primary focused.  if you are keen to teach secondary look at the national curriculum for key stages 3 and 4 and also look at GCSE specifications
